languages.text: "Джай Хейдари ведет дела с опасными людьми, переменчивыми людьми. Такими, как Вольный Торговец. Не будь она понятлива, жизнь ее стала бы горше, чем дым лхо, вылетающий из старческих уст".

"Jae Heydari does business with dangerous people, mercurial people, people like the Rogue Trader. If she weren't understanding, her life would be more bitter than the lho smoke that curls out from between aged lips."
languages.original_text: "Джай Хейдари ведет дела с опасными людьми, переменчивыми людьми. Такими, как Вольный Торговец. Не будь она понятлива, жизнь ее стала бы горше, чем дым лхо, вылетающий из старческих уст".

traits.locale_text: "Jae Heydari does business with dangerous people, mercurial people, people like the Rogue Trader. If she weren't understanding, her life would be more bitter than the lho smoke that curls out from between aged lips."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Jae Heydari does business with dangerous people, mercurial people, people like the Rogue Trader. If she weren't understanding, her life would be more bitter than the lho smoke that curls out from between aged lips."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: «Jae Heydari negocia con gente peligrosa y voluble como Comerciantes Independientes. Si no fuera comprensiva, su vida sería tan amarga como el humo de lho saliendo entre labios envejecidos».
languages.original_text: "Jae Heydari does business with dangerous people, mercurial people, people like the Rogue Trader. If she weren't understanding, her life would be more bitter than the lho smoke that curls out from between aged lips."

traits.locale_text: «Jae Heydari negocia con gente peligrosa y voluble como Comerciantes Independientes. Si no fuera comprensiva, su vida sería tan amarga como el humo de lho saliendo entre labios envejecidos».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: “婕伊·海达利会和危险的人、善变的人、以及行商浪人这样的人做生意。如果她不善解人意，她的人生恐怕会比老人嘴间袅袅升起麻烟还要苦涩。”
languages.original_text: "Jae Heydari does business with dangerous people, mercurial people, people like the Rogue Trader. If she weren't understanding, her life would be more bitter than the lho smoke that curls out from between aged lips."

traits.locale_text: “婕伊·海达利会和危险的人、善变的人、以及行商浪人这样的人做生意。如果她不善解人意，她的人生恐怕会比老人嘴间袅袅升起麻烟还要苦涩。”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: 「ジェイ・ヘイダリは危険なやから、気まぐれな者たち、自由開拓者のような者たちと取引をするんだ。理解力がなければ、彼女の人生は年老いた唇の間から立ち上る煙よりも苦いものになるだろうね」
languages.original_text: "Jae Heydari does business with dangerous people, mercurial people, people like the Rogue Trader. If she weren't understanding, her life would be more bitter than the lho smoke that curls out from between aged lips."

traits.locale_text: 「ジェイ・ヘイダリは危険なやから、気まぐれな者たち、自由開拓者のような者たちと取引をするんだ。理解力がなければ、彼女の人生は年老いた唇の間から立ち上る煙よりも苦いものになるだろうね」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: « Jae Heydari a l'habitude de traiter avec des individus dangereux et versatiles, à l'image {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}. Si elle ne savait pas se montrer compréhensive, sa vie serait plus amère que la fumée du lho qui s'échappe de lèvres trop âgées. »
languages.original_text: "Jae Heydari does business with dangerous people, mercurial people, people like the Rogue Trader. If she weren't understanding, her life would be more bitter than the lho smoke that curls out from between aged lips."

traits.locale_text: « Jae Heydari a l'habitude de traiter avec des individus dangereux et versatiles, à l'image {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}. Si elle ne savait pas se montrer compréhensive, sa vie serait plus amère que la fumée du lho qui s'échappe de lèvres trop âgées. »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Jae Heydari treibt Geschäfte mit gefährlichen Leuten, unberechenbaren Leuten, Leuten wie {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin}. Wäre sie nicht so verständnisvoll, wäre ihr Leben bitterer als der Lho-Rauch, der zwischen alten Lippen hervorgequollen kommt."
languages.original_text: "Jae Heydari does business with dangerous people, mercurial people, people like the Rogue Trader. If she weren't understanding, her life would be more bitter than the lho smoke that curls out from between aged lips."

traits.locale_text: "Jae Heydari treibt Geschäfte mit gefährlichen Leuten, unberechenbaren Leuten, Leuten wie {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin}. Wäre sie nicht so verständnisvoll, wäre ihr Leben bitterer als der Lho-Rauch, der zwischen alten Lippen hervorgequollen kommt."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.original_text: "Jae Heydari does business with dangerous people, mercurial people, people like the Rogue Trader. If she weren't understanding, her life would be more bitter than the lho smoke that curls out from between aged lips."

languages.text: "Jae Heydari, Hür Tacir gibi tehlikeli, değişken insanlarla iş yapar. Eğer anlayışlı biri olmasaydı hayatı, yorgun dudakların arasından yükselen liho dumanından daha acı bir hâl alırdı."
languages.original_text: "Jae Heydari does business with dangerous people, mercurial people, people like the Rogue Trader. If she weren't understanding, her life would be more bitter than the lho smoke that curls out from between aged lips."

traits.locale_text: "Jae Heydari tehlikeli insanlarla iş yapar. Değişken insanlarla. Hür Tacir gibilerle. Eğer anlayışlı biri olmasaydı hayatı, yorgun dudakların arasından yükselen liho dumanından daha acı bir hâl alırdı."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
